name: PARAMOUNT GROUP, INC.
footnote: Represents the consolidated assets and liabilities of Paramount Group Operating Partnership LP, a Delaware limited partnership (the Operating Partnership). The Operating Partnership is a consolidated variable interest entity (VIE), of which we are the sole general partner and own approximately 89.9% as of June 30, 2017.
